articles.title: Reservoirs of SARS-CoV-2 and their potential role in Long COVID - WSWS
articles.description: There is considerable evidence that the undetected presence of SARS-CoV-2 causes many of the health problems, some severe, described in the term “Long COVID."
articles.content: A review article in Nature Immunology summarizes what is currently known about the persistence of SARS-CoV-2 virus in the body after COVID-19. Theorized as a possible cause of Long COVID, the ongoing… [+8559 chars]
